Absolutely perfect game. Best snowboard on the market. Everything from the 
graphics, controls, levels, courses, exp system are amazing! I highly 
recommend if you're looking for a quality snowboard game to drop hours on. 
Edit: comment response 4-16-18 You're welcome. No thanks on the snow suit. 
I have tried snowboard party Aspen, and I have written a review that you 
already replied to months ago. Needless to say, you took a perfect game and 
ruined it, for what seems to be a money grab. I would have loved to spend 
another $1.99 on Aspen to support you guys had you not ruined it. Why fix 
something that's not broken, especially to only make it worse?!Feel free to 
check the review out under the same user name.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Have you checked Snowboard Party Aspen? We have a FREE Ski Suit Giveaway. Send a screenshot of your score on the "Punch Bowl" while wearing the Tipsy Elves ski suit to info@tipsyelves.com - the highest score wins!

For an Android app, this game is 5 stars as the best snowboard sim on the market.  Smooth analog controls, in-game currency store items, and slippery slopes.  Would love to see a Story Mode or a create-a-character addition in newer installments.  Maybe connected slopes on a single mountain? (Ski lifts and all)
I love itttt. I just don't know how to balance a grind. Haha
Finally someone has found a body rotation engine that is "somewhat realistic" Super fun.
Reminds me of cool boarders.....the easier version great game
I liked how i could do awesome tricks
Best snowboard game since 1080!  I would like to be able to make custom move lists

Feels more like riding on ice than snow.  There's no depth to the snow and you barely leave any tracks (what little you do disappears quickly) or spray much during turns.  The jumps are gigantic (unrealistically, but in a good way) and terrain is fairly steep.  If you don't like the marked course, there are hidden routes you can take...but you're still always riding on crust.  The music is god-awful rap/emo mix garbage.   Game doesn't really inspire me to keep playing (but I already paid).  Now, if someone made a game called "powder hound",...

I like how the game is able to be saved under SD card instead of device memory since game size is fairly big. I also enjoy how you can log in using Google instead of F.B only (like some other games). I would like to see these gentlemen make a mobile sport game where xtreme high jumps are focused on free mode with no time limit. Like high jump platforms in x games with ability to mod platform so there would be endless ridiculous high jump availability.  Anyway, good game.
Fun to play and good time waster
Awesome game, lots of customization and upgrades to unlock. Fun gameplay
Love the controller support!! Makes the game perfect. But why don't I get the achievement of 5 freestyle sessions completed even if I got the one for 50?
Great game but as you get new boards it seems a little glitchy. Still its awesome

You earn points so slowly to unlock extra things, you basically have to buy the app and then expect another 4 or more dollars just to get the riders you want. It is fun but honestly sucks that you have to pay so much, the app should be free with in app-purchases
Pro's: fun game,well made, shield tab controller support. Con's: expensive IAP even though its optional,feels bad as paid app.
Great game

The only problem is that it seems a bit slow. Is that just how it starts? Also I would like it if the tricks weren't performed on the analog stick. I guess I could just get used to it but all in all we finally have an amazing snowboarding game on mobile! Edit: Just wanted to request other styles of music. Emo is horrible and makes me claw at my seat. Not to mention that I'm looking around hoping no one thinks I'm listening effeminate emo. Lol.

content: Console game on mobile. Plays excellent on shield. Good quality and very well made. Edit -- I had to lower the rating because the game half way becomes a grind and multiplayer mode is terrible. Pay to win. Too bad because the game is fun and the controls are spot on. Now I am bored because the business model is ruining my buzz. Just increase the price of the game or offer a pro version. This in game gold (exp) is more of a scheme than anything. More event types need to be added and improve mp mode.

Easily the best snowboard game I've ever played. I have no idea why more people don't download it. Graphics are amazing, runs smoothly and controls are pretty decent. Catch some major air in big air mode, halfpipe mode and freestyle. Nice courses with the opportunity to get a lot of points. I've had it for 4 days and I am scoring over a million. Just keep playing online or offline and make your snowboarder awesome! Easily worth the money. $1.99! For endless fun.
I haven't found a truly good snowboarding game until this one! The money is worth it!
Fun
By far the best game of its type on Android.  Great graphics and runs flawless on Gs5. .  Keep it up

By far it is the most realistic snowboarding game available! Runs perfectly on my Xiaomi Mi3W on both Balanced and Performance mode. One thing I would love to see is a more realistic transition when jumping to grind a rail. The current transition feels as if the rail has a magnet that pulls you towards it. Other than that, excellent game, would recommend it to anyone reading this!
Nicely made, much better than skate party
Great game :D
